metadata.feature_description: Import and export module content for backup or migration purposes

steps.action: Navigate to Settings > Import/Export in admin panel
steps.expected: Import/Export page loads with site selection and log
steps.actual: Import/Export page displayed with site dropdown, Import/Export buttons, and log showing previous operations

steps.action: Select 'My Website' from the site dropdown
steps.expected: Site selected and Export/Import buttons become enabled
steps.actual: My Website selected, Last Import/Export dates shown, both buttons enabled
Export Data form opened with Name, Description fields, Include in Export toggles (Content, Assets, Users, Roles, etc.), and Pages selection
Name and description entered successfully, all export options visible and configurable
Success message 'Your data export has been placed in the queue, and will begin shortly' displayed. Export appeared in log with 'Submitted' then 'In Progress' status
Export progressed showing Users: 14/14, Roles: 18/18, Vocabularies: 26/28, Page Templates: 6/6. Export completed with 5.7 MB package created
Import Data page opened showing available export packages with details (name, date, folder, mode, size)

steps.expected: Package selected and Continue button enabled
steps.actual: Package selected with checkmark, description tooltip displayed, Continue button enabled

steps.expected: System validates package and shows import summary
steps.actual: System displayed 'checking the package' message, then showed Import Summary with Users: 14, Pages: 33, Roles: 18, Vocabularies: 26, Extensions: 58, Assets: 52, Total Size: 5.7 MB
Success message displayed: 'Your data import has been placed in the queue, and will begin shortly' with green checkmark

steps.expected: System validates package format before allowing import
steps.actual: System displayed 'Just a moment, we are checking the package' while validating the export package structure and format

steps.expected: Valid package shows import summary, invalid would show error
steps.actual: Package validated successfully - Import Summary displayed with complete breakdown of all content types (Users, Pages, Roles, Vocabularies, Extensions, Assets, Content Library) confirming valid package format

observations: The DNN Import/Export feature operates at the site level rather than individual module level. It exports and imports entire site content including all HTML module content as part of the site package.
The HtmlTextController class implements IPortable interface with ExportModule and ImportModule methods (lines 405-469) that handle XML serialization of HTML content with tokenized links.
Export packages are stored in the App_Data/ExportImport folder on the server.
The export supports both 'Differential' and 'Full' export modes.
Import validation checks package integrity before allowing the import to proceed.
Both export and import operations run asynchronously in a queue system.
The system preserves workflow state and content versioning during export/import operations.
